Amazing crystal clear message.  It's communication like this that make it all worth it.  Isn't this the very response many of us search for?  
   
  Juli

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           This is what EVP, ghosts, hauntings, and the paranormal is all about. It is not for building up egos, or pocket books! This is the message. 
 
 Frank-S
